title: Strega Nonna
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Gene Deitch
brief_description: Animated version of a traditional Calabrian tale retold and illustrated by Tomi de Paola. The story tells about a wise witch and her magic pasta pot. Winner of numerous awards. Suitable for primary school level.
